style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="435" y="1800" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="41" value="" style="edgeStyle=elbowEdgeStyle;elbow=vertical;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryPerimeter=0;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#003366;strokeWidth=1;html=1;" parent="1" source="34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" height="100" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="175" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="495" y="1661.5" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="45" value="" style="edgeStyle=elbowEdgeStyle;elbow=horizontal;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.905;entryY=0.5;entryPerimeter=0;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#003366;strokeWidth=1;html=1;" parent="1" source="24" target="34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" height="100" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="100" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="100" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="950" y="1320" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="46" value="Failure RED light" style="text;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;gradientColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="1220" width="28" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="49" value="Success GREEN" style="text;fontColor=#001933;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;gradientColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="369" y="1220" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="55" value="no" style="text;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;gradientColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="585.5" y="1680" width="18" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-55" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">The process begins with the user placing their hand on a planar surface along the XY plane. This is important for calibrating the device.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="50" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-57" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">The user turns on the device using a toggle switch.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="145" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-66" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">User performs an ASL sign language gesture (e.g., saying "HELLO").<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="410" y="655" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-67" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">The system analyzes the ASL gesture.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="875" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-68" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">There's a 1-second delay.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="411.5" y="990" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-69" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">In case of failure, FLASH red light, &amp; users are instructed to redo the sign language.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="1310" width="340" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-70" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="24" target="29" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="320" y="1260" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-72" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="24" target="28" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="321" y="1260" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-73" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">If successful, users have the option to use a speaker to vocalize the sentence or continue adding more words.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="555" y="1190" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-74" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">To vocalize the recognized words, users can press the "SpeakUpPushButton."<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="570.25" y="1570" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-76" value="<h1><font style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 14px;"><i style="">The green light should turn on to indicate that the glove is ready to use.</i></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="280" width="500" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-83" value="yes" style="text;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;gradientColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="574.5" y="1380" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-88" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-84" target="34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-77" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-84" target="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-56" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="820" y="1413" /> <mxPoint x="820" y="400" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="400" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-84" value="Continue Adding&nbsp;<br>words?" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="419.75" y="1361.5" width="150.5" height="102.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-85" value="no" style="text;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;gradientColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-90" target="40" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-90" value="Toggle Switch OFF" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.data;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="415.5" y="1670" width="159" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-91" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">The user turns off the device using a toggle switch.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="221" y="1680" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-94" value="yes" <mxCell id="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-95" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="chX0-RsK3u1Xn2yj09A4-90" target="6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="990" y="1710" /> <mxPoint x="990" y="250" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="250" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-56" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="443.5" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-63" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.095;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="6" target="3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="250" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="60" y="349" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="170" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-64" value="StartStopPushButton" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="458.5" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-65" value="<h1><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal;">Press once to start collecting the data, press it again to stop detecting it.</span><br></h1>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="436" width="290" height="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-68" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-64" target="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-67" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="489" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="640" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-67" value="Delay" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.document;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="255.25" y="540" width="129.5" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-69" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">There's a 1-second delay, so that the user can have the initial position while doing the gesture.<br></font></h1><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="399.5" y="520" width="490" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-70" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="757.5" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-71" value="StartStopPushButton" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="772.5" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-72" value="<h1><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal;">press it again to stop detecting it.</span><br></h1>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="750" width="290" height="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-80" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0.195;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-70" target="20" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="320" y="876" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-81" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="20" target="22" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-55" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">LED TURNS ON</span>" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="472.25" y="590" width="98" height="57" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-57" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="w2ifc1TvAUmCdBrHAUoA-67" target="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-55"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="521" y="570" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-58" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-55" target="13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-59" value="<h1><font style="font-size: 8px; font-weight: normal;">The delay is over, and immediately start the gesture.</font></h1>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="617.5" width="195.5" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yT79R9kli4hFoMhcIGSo-60" value="yes"
